titles.title: Northern Front Range Roadless Area Protection Act
To provide interim protection for certain roadless areas in the Arapaho and Roosevelt National Forests in Colorado, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: 2/8/2001--Introduced. Northern Front Range Roadless Area Protection Act - Requires specified lands within the Arapaho and Roosevelt National Forests in Colorado to be managed by the Secretary of Agriculture as protected roadless areas. Requires a report from the Secretary concerning such lands' suitability for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System.
